# UseMods

UseMods is a mighty set of missing functions for your frontend, framework and SSR applications. All the bells, whistles, and scooter mirrors you'll ever need.

## Getting Started

[Introduction](https://usemods.com/intro/introduction) - UseMods is a mighty set of missing functions for your frontend, framework and SSR applications. All the bells, whistles, and scooter mirrors you'll ever need.
[Installation](https://usemods.com/intro/installation) - Running and loving mods

## Documentation

[Formatters](https://usemods.com/docs/formatters) - Wrangle wild data types into submission. Spruce up numbers, give strings smarts, and make complex content dazzle.
[Modifiers](https://usemods.com/docs/modifiers) - Modify and transform your content with our collection of efficient and easy-to-use functions designed to dicipher, manipulate, and transform strings.
[Generators](https://usemods.com/docs/generators) - A collection of magical functions that conjure data out of thin air.
[Actions](https://usemods.com/docs/actions) - A stack of handy functions you could write yourself, but don't want to.
[Numbers](https://usemods.com/docs/numbers) - This file contains functions that are related to numbers.
[Data](https://usemods.com/docs/data) - A collection of functions for formatting, filtering and taming wild arrays and objects.
[Validators](https://usemods.com/docs/validators) - A collection of validators for common data types
[Detections](https://usemods.com/docs/detections) - Client-side detections for various user and browser information. Perfect for personalisation, analytics or debugging weird and wonderful bugs. You will need to add a listeners for reactivity.
[Devices](https://usemods.com/docs/devices) - Client-side detections user's machines.
[Goodies](https://usemods.com/docs/goodies) - A collection neat little functions that don't belong anywhere else.
